values: 攻击；（在战争等中使用武器）进攻；抨击；严厉批评；侵袭；着手处理；积极应对；侵害；公开抨击；非难；奋力处理
袭击；进攻；抨击；突然发作（如疾病）；着手处理；（音乐中的）起声；进攻队员；得分手；（计算机）网络攻击；（病、虫等的）损害；非难；（情感的）一阵突发

sample.mean: v. 出席；参加；照管；去处理；伴随；注意；照顾；照料；侍候；定期去
n. 关注；注意；关心；照料；立正；注意力；殷勤
adj. 注意的；专心的；体贴的；有礼貌的；无微不至的
v. 证明；表明；宣誓服兵役；作证；证明存在；证明为真实；作见证；使宣誓服役
v. 引来；吸引；引起；诱惑；激起；使（人）产生兴趣
n. 大头钉；平头钉；粗缝针脚；抢风调向；系帆索；黏着性；黏着力；鞍辔；马具；便宜货；劣质品

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"钉子”, 引申为"连接"

word_mean_info__list.difference: 词义宽泛，既可指武装入侵别国领土，又可指文化、经济等方面的侵略。侧重敌意行动和征服的企图。
多指进攻的态势，常指大规模的协同军事行动。
多指具体的侵入或侵犯别国领土，也可用于指抽象事件。
主要指突然而猛烈的进攻。
普通用词，含义广，指事先不发警告，主动地向对方发起武力进攻或对言论等进行抨击。

word_group.brief_definition: 恐怖袭击；恐怖攻击；恐怖主义攻击
字典攻击；字典破解；词典攻击
突然袭击；突然攻击；突袭
导弹攻击；导弹袭击；导弹进攻
火箭攻击；火箭袭击；火箭进攻
敌人攻击；敌人袭击；敌方来袭

bilingual.source: They attack enemy colonies in search of food.
bilingual.target: 它们攻击敌对群体以寻找食物。

bilingual.source: It hunts other sharks too and can attack people.
bilingual.target: 它也捕猎其他鲨鱼并能攻击人类。

bilingual.source: Experts have proved that, and they attack us by mistake.
bilingual.target: 专家已经证明了，他们误攻击我们。
他计划在夜晚发起攻击。

bilingual.source: He used a shield to block the attack.
They launched the attack at zero hour.
bilingual.target: 他们在零时发起了攻击。

bilingual.source: The aggressor launched an attack at dawn.
bilingual.target: 侵略者在黎明发动了攻击。

bilingual.source: The city fell under the enemy's attack.
bilingual.target: 城市在敌人的攻击下沦陷了。

bilingual.source: We must defend against the enemy's attack.
bilingual.target: 我们必须防御敌人的攻击。

list.abstract: 《Attack》是Thirty Seconds to Mars演唱的英语摇滚歌曲，发行于2005年1月1日，收录于专辑《A Beautiful Lie》中。
《ATTACK》是由Thirty Seconds to Mars（30秒上火星）演唱的歌曲，该歌曲收录于同名专辑《ATTACK》中。

yingyinNormal.en: All they need is for the dominant life form to attack and…
yingyinNormal.zh: 最终目的是攻击地球上的人类，然后…

yingyinNormal.en: The attack was aimed at the district's main telecom switching center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这次攻击针对的是特区的主要电信交换中心。

yingyinNormal.en: Down there a Defense Department contract was just attacked in a terrorist attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 国防部的合约机构遭到了恐怖攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm done trying to win over people's hearts. Let's attack their hearts.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我受够了试图赢取人心。我们来攻击人心吧。

yingyinNormal.en: You know I don't have that kind of patience. Why did Northuldra attack us anyway? Who attacks people who give them gifts?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也知道我没有那种耐心，为什么诺桑德拉人要攻击我们？谁会攻击送礼物的人呢？

yingyinNormal.en: I want to endorse you. I'll lay off you tonight. You and I attack Underwood. In three days, I'll drop out and endorse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想支持你。今晚我不攻击你，我们一起攻击安德伍德。三天后，我将退出并支持你。

yingyinNormal.en: There's going to be an attack on a British passenger convoy. Right there.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个英国护航队马上要遭受攻击。就在那儿.

yingyinNormal.en: Of course you can defend yourself from an attack you know is coming, that's not enough.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当然可以抵挡已知的攻击，但那样还不够。

yingyinNormal.en: Bite me, Douglas. Right. That's the way you usually attack any argument.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你咬我啊，道格拉斯。没错你对每个反对言论都是那么攻击的。

yingyinNormal.en: The Monstrous Nightmare. Firepower 15. The Terrible Terror. Attack 8, venom 12.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猛烈凶魇，火力15级。恐怖龙，攻击性8级、毒性12级。

yingyinNormal.en: It needs to make antibodies, proteins that will attack and kill the invading virus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它需要制造叫做抗体的会攻击并杀掉入侵病毒的一种蛋白质。

yingyinNormal.en: As for our Kansas farmer, Greg Stone, his corn-growing operation is under attack.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而我们堪萨斯的农场主，格雷格斯通，他的玉米种植工程正在受到攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: All I'm saying is, it's one thing being prepared for an attack against like each other, whole another story being prepared for an attack, I don't know, like a surprise.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是说应付彼此攻击是一回事，应付偷袭又是另一回事，我不知道，比如意外！！

yingyinNormal.en: I knew it! I knew I wasn't crazy! Last year, a monkey did attack me at the bus stop!
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就知道，我就知道我没有发疯，去年的确有一只猴子在公交车站攻击我。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, even if that's true, you should attack her for using the hurricane to score sympathy points.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，即使成真，你也应该攻击她，借飓风给自己拉同情票。

yingyinNormal.en: Could we create a decoy? Send troops towards one of the gates and just send an attack on another.
yingyinNormal.zh: 调虎离山如何？派军队去其中一个大门，然后在另一个门发动攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: Imagine New York City, being victim to a chemical attack. This mutagen would be able to reverse its effects.
yingyinNormal.zh: 试想一下如果纽约被生物武器攻击然而这种突变体，可以用来反转它的作用。

yingyinNormal.en: So I'm blowing my attack whistle thingy and three more cabs show up, and as I'm going to get into a cab she tackles me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我拿出口哨猛吹，结果又来了三辆计程车，我要上车时，她又展开攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: Analysis. What motivated your attack on Clementine? A cognitive error triggered my Good Samaritan reflex.
yingyinNormal.zh: 分析模式，你攻击克莱门汀的动机是什么？一个认知错误触发了我的仁慈撒玛利亚人反射。

yingyinNormal.en: Someone in our firm is feeding evidence to Viola Walsh so she can attack us. I've been asked to find out who.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们律所里有人私下向维奥拉沃尔什提供证据，帮她攻击我们，他们叫我把这人揪出来。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抑制; 解决; 处理

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en:
begin to affect or to act upon harmfully;
a sudden, short period of illness, usually severe, especially an illness that you have often

examination_example.sentence: The science tells us that means real health benefits — fewer heart <highlight>attacks</highlight>, strokes and premature births, less cancer, dementia and asthma.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 科学告诉我们，这意味着健康真正的好处——更少患心脏病、中风、早产、癌症、痴呆和哮喘等疾病。

sense_info_list.en:
use harsh words against;
strong criticism of someone or something in speech or in writing

examination_example.sentence: Labour is under <highlight>attack</highlight> for opposing development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工党因反对发展而受到抨击。

sense_info_list.en: an action that you take to try to stop or change something that you feel is bad
sense_info_list.zh: 抑制; 解决; 处理

sample.mean: v. 出席；参加；照管；去处理；伴随；注意；照顾；照料；侍候；定期去
n. 关注；注意；关心；照料；立正；注意力；殷勤
adj. 注意的；专心的；体贴的；有礼貌的；无微不至的
v. 证明；表明；宣誓服兵役；作证；证明存在；证明为真实；作见证；使宣誓服役
v. 引来；吸引；引起；诱惑；激起；使（人）产生兴趣
n. 大头钉；平头钉；粗缝针脚；抢风调向；系帆索；黏着性；黏着力；鞍辔；马具；便宜货；劣质品

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"钉子”, 引申为"连接"

word_usage.usage: attack后接on sth./sb.可表示抨击/攻击/袭击/进攻的对象。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 是常用词，指“攻击敌人”或“用言论攻击他人”。
指“猛烈连续地攻击”。
指“冲击”或“骑兵的突然攻击”。
指“围攻”即从各个方向攻击。
语气比assail强，指“突然猛烈地进攻”，暗示“武力的直接接触（如肉搏等）”，也有“暴力”的意思。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 袭击者；前锋；锋线队员

word_family.mean: v. 进攻；攻击；侵害；严厉批评；公开抨击；袭击；侵袭；狠抓；大力处理；发起进攻

examination_example.sentence: This idea is based on the principle that lions and other predators are far less likely to <highlight>attack</highlight> when they feel they are being watched.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个想法是基于这样一种原理，即当狮子和其他掠食者感到被监视时，它们发动攻击的可能性要小得多。

sense_info_list.en:
use harsh words against;
strong criticism of someone or something in speech or in writing

examination_example.sentence: But I think when we get feedback from someone we trust, we understand that the feedback isn't some kind of personal <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但我认为，当我们从我们信任的人那里得到反馈时，我们会明白，这些反馈并不是某种人身攻击。

examination_example.sentence: Otherwise, people might interpret feedback as some kind of personal <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 否则，人们可能会将反馈解读为某种人身攻击。

sense_info_list.en: the action of something such as an insect, or a disease, that causes damage to something or someone

examination_example.sentence: The moth's ability also to <highlight>attack</highlight> crops like pepper and potatoes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种蛾也有能力攻击像胡椒和土豆这样的作物。

sense_info_list.en:
begin to affect or to act upon harmfully;
a sudden, short period of illness, usually severe, especially an illness that you have often

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"钉子”, 引申为"连接"

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 词义宽泛, 既可指武装入侵别国领土, 又可指文化、经济等方面的侵略, 侧重敌意行动和征服的企图。
主要指突然而猛烈的进攻。
普通用词, 含义广, 指事先不发警告, 主动地向对方发起武力进攻或对言论等进行抨击。
多指具体的侵入或侵犯别国领土, 也可用于指抽象事件。
多指进攻的态势, 常指大规模的协同军事行动。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 抑制; 打击; 处理

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 袭击者；前锋；锋线队员

word_family.mean: v. 进攻；攻击；侵害；严厉批评；公开抨击；袭击；侵袭；狠抓；大力处理；发起进攻

examination_example.sentence: Many people have been <highlight>attacked</highlight> by Devil Firefish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很多人都被魔鬼火鱼攻击过。

examination_example.sentence: In a 2011 USPS case study, the agency emphasized its massive infrastructure as a "unique federal asset" to be called upon in a disaster or terrorist <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2011年美国邮政的一份案例研究中，该机构强调其庞大的基础设施是在灾难或恐怖袭击中需要调用的一份“独特的联邦资产。”

examination_example.sentence: Tourism throughout Turkey is expected to fall this year as the country has been the victim of several deadly terrorist <highlight>attacks</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于土耳其已成为数起致命恐怖袭击的受害者，今年该国各地的旅游业预计都将下滑。

sense_info_list.en:
begin to affect or to act upon harmfully; 
a sudden; short period of illness; usually severe; especially an illness that you have often

examination_example.sentence: For example, women are more likely to experience disturbed sleep, anxiety and unusual fatigue before a heart <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，女性在心脏病发作前更有可能经历睡眠紊乱、焦虑和不寻常的疲劳。

examination_example.sentence: He had a heart <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他心脏病发作了。

examination_example.sentence: People who sleep less tend to have higher blood pressure, heart <highlight>attack</highlight>, diabetes, weight gain and other problems.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 睡眠不足的人往往有高血压、心脏病发作、糖尿病、体重增加和其他问题。

sense_info_list.en: an action that you take to try to stop or change something that you feel is bad
sense_info_list.zh: 抑制; 打击; 处理

examination_example.sentence: Michigan's dominance in auto research and development is under <highlight>attack</highlight> from several states and countries which desire to replace our leadership in transportation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 密西根在汽车研发和发展方面的主导地位受到了其他州和国家的威胁，他们想取代密西根州在交通领域的领导地位。

sense_info_list.en:
use harsh words against; 
strong criticism of someone or something in speech or in writing

主要指突然而猛烈的进攻。
普通用词，含义广，指事先不发警告，主动地向对方发起武力进攻或对言论等进行抨击。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 袭击者；前锋；锋线队员

word_family.mean: v. 进攻；攻击；侵害；严厉批评；公开抨击；袭击；侵袭；狠抓；大力处理；发起进攻

examination_example.sentence: Fighting, however, usually involves personal <highlight>attacks</highlight>, raising of voices, and storming out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，战斗通常包括人身攻击、提高声音和暴走。

examination_example.sentence: When a leafy plant is under <highlight>attack</highlight>, it doesn't sit quietly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当多叶植物受到攻击时，它不会安静地呆着。

sense_info_list.en: use harsh words against; strong criticism of someone or something in speech or in writing

examination_example.sentence: When a student <highlight>attacks</highlight> a professor on the social media, the language used actually says more about the student.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当一名学生在社交媒体上抨击教授时，所使用的语言实际上更多地反映了这个学生。

sense_info_list.en: begin to affect or to act upon harmfully; a sudden, short period of illness, usually severe, especially an illness that you have often

examination_example.sentence: One afternoon, while attempting to get into bed she collapsed (倒下) from what was eventually discovered to be a heart <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一天下午，在试图上床睡觉时，她因心脏病发作而昏倒。

sample.mean: v. 出席；参加；照管；去处理；伴随；注意；照顾；照料；侍候；定期去
n. 关注；注意；关心；照料；立正；注意力；殷勤
adj. 注意的；专心的；体贴的；有礼貌的；无微不至的
v. 证明；表明；宣誓服兵役；作证；证明存在；证明为真实；作见证；使宣誓服役
v. 引来；吸引；引起；诱惑；激起；使（人）产生兴趣
n. 大头钉；平头钉；粗缝针脚；抢风调向；系帆索；黏着性；黏着力；鞍辔；马具；便宜货；劣质品

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示"钉子”, 引申为"连接"

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 词义宽泛，既可指武装入侵别国领土，又可指文化、经济等方面的侵略，侧重敌意行动和征服的企图。
主要指突然而猛烈的进攻。
普通用词，含义广，指事先不发警告，主动地向对方发起武力进攻或对言论等进行抨击。
多指具体的侵入或侵犯别国领土，也可用于指抽象事件。
多指进攻的态势，常指大规模的协同军事行动。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 袭击者；前锋；锋线队员

word_family.mean: v. 进攻；攻击；侵害；严厉批评；公开抨击；袭击；侵袭；狠抓；大力处理；发起进攻

examination_example.sentence: What will plants do when they are <highlight>attacked</highlight> by insects?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当植物受到昆虫攻击时，它们会做什么?

examination_example.sentence: When Cao Cao's soldiers heard the sounds, they thought they were under <highlight>attack</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 曹操的士兵听到声音，以为自己受到了攻击。

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps wolves <highlight>attacked</highlight> too many people or ate too many farm animals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许狼袭击了太多的人或者吃了太多的家畜。
